mapper.select: SELECT user_id, refresh_token, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM user_refresh_token WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_refresh_token ( user_id, refresh_token, expires_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{refreshToken}, #{expiresAt}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_refresh_token SET refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, expires_at = #{expiresAt}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
